title: Neurotech - Infra Versus Ultra (2014)
description:
Neurotech is a one man band from Ljubliana, Slovenia. He not only plays all the instruments, but is also the producer and the composer for the band. The former drummer Siph has left the band.

Formed in 2007 in Ljubliana, Central Slovenia, they have released only two full length albums, four EPs, four singles, and one compilation album.

His 2008 EP "Transhuman" was released under Canadian netlabel Deadknife Records and through Bandcamp His album Antagonist was self released through Bandcamp on 10 April 2011. In December 2011, the band released a new song "Blue Screen Planet" as an EP.

On 22 April 2012, the band released the Decipher Vol. 1 EP, and Vol. 2 EP on 30 September 2012. A compilation containig both volumes and a Volume 3 (never released separately) was released on 23 June 2013.

Infra Versus Ultra is the new album for the band and was released on 27 October 2014. It contains ten songs and was released in digipak edition in independent way.



Band Members

Wulf - everything



Discography

Transhuman (2008) (EP)
Antagonist (2011)
Blue Screen Planet (2011) (EP)
Decipher Vol. 1 (2012) (EP)
Decipher Vol. 2 (2012) (EP)
